text: Jorge Aristóteles Sandoval Díaz (22 January 1974 – 18 December 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Sandoval was Governor of Jalisco from 2013 to 2018. Sandoval was born in Guadalajara, Jalisco. Sandoval was assassinated on 18 December 2020 in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican politicians Category:Assassinated Mexican people Category:Murders by firearm Category:People from Guadalajara
title: Aristóteles Sandoval
